directions: In a medium bowl, mix the beef, diced green chilies, and bouillon. Shape into 4 patties.
Lightly oil the grill grate. Grill patties 5 minutes per side, or until well done. Top each patty with cheese about 2 minutes prior to removing from grill.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies, drained
title: Firecracker Burgers
